title: (x) The Crown Valley Group, Inc. - Basilea {Eric Schmid}
content:
This looks familiar to me, but cannot pin it down. Anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605211051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/crown.jpg)

 [‹ Would Show the Extra Bold ornate serif face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605211051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19324 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Pampers website hand printed script - Andy Bold {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605211051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19315 "Go to next forum topic")
author: evan

comments.content: Hmm, maybe not. Or it’s just been mangled beyond recognition.
where did you find such a clean sample?
nevermind, looks like from the website, duh
Cannot find a link but I think it is Basilea - from maybe VGC and/or offered at one time by ImageClub. AFAIK
